name: Stanford Science Bowl
logistics: In-person on Stanford's campus. Tournament runs from approximately 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM. Round robin in the morning followed by double elimination and consolation in the afternoon.

registration.instructions: If more than 48 teams register, each school will be guaranteed a first team; all other spots will be decided by a lottery among second and (if space allows) third teams. No preference will be given by time of registration. Fill out the interest form to get updates and reminders.

format.summary: Round robin in the morning followed by double elimination and consolation bracket in the afternoon

phases.name: Double Elimination & Consolation
phases.description: Afternoon double elimination and consolation brackets

writing_team: Stanford Science Bowl question set (used by several invitationals across the country)
